frame.name: Trying_out
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Evaluator</fen> participates in an <fen>Experience</fen> (or metonymically, a salient <fen>Entity</fen> of the <fen>Experience</fen>), often for the first time, in order to form an opinion about its quality. The aspect of quality that is being judged is often implicit but may be expressed as the <fen>Purpose</fen> of the <fen>Evaluator</fen>'s participation.
<ex>Have you <t>tried</t> my latest get-rich-quick scheme? <fex name="Purpose">INI</fex></ex> <ex>Don <t>tried out</t> the bike <fex name="Purpose">to see if it was the right size</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Evaluator
FE.definition:
<def-root>The person (or metonymic manifestation thereof) that participates in the <fen>Experience</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Evaluator">She</fex> <t>tested out</t> six cars before finding the one she liked.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Experience
FE.definition:
<def-root>The activity or event that the <fen>Evaluator</fen> participates in.
<ex>Have you ever <t>tried</t> <fex name="Experience">working out with kettlebells?</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Entity</fen> is something that the <fen>Evaluator</fen> uses to try an <fen>Experience</fen>, and metonymically stands in for the <fen>Experience</fen>.
<ex>We <t>tried out</t> <fex name="Entity">the games</fex>, and they're fun.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>A description of how the <fen>Evaluator</fen> acts in having the <fen>Experience</fen>.
<ex>We <fex name="Manner">cautiously</fex> <t>tried</t> the new system.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>A description of what the <fen>Evaluator</fen> does in order to participate in the <fen>Experience</fen>.
<ex>We <t>tried out</t> the trampoline <fex name="Means">by letting our 2 year old jump on it</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>A more explicit description of what the <fen>Evaluator</fen> seeks to learn by having the <fen>Experience</fen>.
<ex>I <t>tried out</t> my neighbors vacuums <fex name="Purpose">to see if they met my needs</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The temporal location during which the <fen>Experience</fen> occurs.
<ex><t>Try</t> it <t>out</t> <fex name="Time">at midnight</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The physical location in which the <fen>Experience</fen> occurs.
<ex>I <t>tried</t> it for the first time <fex name="Place">at home</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: try.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to do something (in order to make an assessment)

lexUnit.name: test out.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to use something for the first time (to make an assessment)

lexUnit.name: try out.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to do something for the first time (to make an assessment)
